original_title: ビー・バップ・セーラー服
overview: Be-Bop Sailor Suit was released in 1988. It was released as an parody of Be-Bop High School, which was popular at that time. Starring AV and pinku eiga actresses such as Shizuka Honda and Sayoko Nakajima. A story about Sayoko Nakajima, who has a relationship with her teacher. There is also a Sukeban group (delinquent girl).
title: Be-Bop Sailor Suit
